ModMetaData.name: Archotech Stack Gene
ModMetaData.author: Bardez
ModMetaData.description:
[h1]Archotech Stack Gene[/h1] What it says on the tin: adds an Archotech gene for the Archotech Stack to be automatically applied. Updated for 1.6 and based on Altered Carbon 2.0
Note: Forked from [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3280895047]Archotech Gene 1.5 (crowbarcollective)[/url] and [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2907088162]earlier (Rince)[/url] and
